name: RGB shooter
description:
Install instructions

For windows and mac just run the executabel, there is also a HTML included which can be used to put it on a webserver. It can also be played here

The game was made rather quickly maybe only 20 hours were spend actually making it so it might be a bit buggy because I haven't had time to test it a lot.

Source is included, have fun!!

If you find any bugs or have any problems feel free to mail me
